ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old
ygData.msgSnippet: Monday night - some friends were camping the hand room and pulling the warlord - no bard - and they let me loot it!  Too bad I m not waiting for 53 and (2.5
ygData.messageBody:
Monday night - some friends were camping the hand room and pulling the
warlord - no bard - and they let me loot it! Too bad I'm not waiting for 53
and (2.5 blue bubs away) and have no dragon scales - so when I can actually
complete it is in doubt...

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 11:46 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old

I've been camping it for 2 weeks now, have yet to see the harmonic or the
skull. Just stupid supple scale armbands. = (

On the bright side, I did manage to nab a skean the other day while helping
a rogue guildy.

-----Original Message-----
